text: Good evening, how are you?
I'm great. Hope you've had a good weekend.
You too. Where are you from?
I'm from New Hampshire but moved south 9 years ago. How about you?
Chicago. Where is south? How's the weather?
I'm near Savannah and Hilton Head. Hot and humid, lots of thunderstorms. But so much better than ice and snow and freezing cold!
Ha! Yeah. We have those storms now. It's pretty scary now. What do you do for a living.
I'm retired. Used to sell health insurance. Worked for an HMO, back in the days when health insurance wasn't such a dirty word.
Nice. Have you ever heard of save the children?
I think so but I'm not sure of the specifics. Are you involved with them?
Kind of...Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Yes. I care about those things. I did 3 mission trips to Africa working with children orphaned by AIDS and placed in foster homes by a Christian organization.
Wow! Would you like to donate a small part of your income payment to them today?
I think I'll pass. I donate to lots of other causes - my church, HIV issues and others.
I understand. There's a lot of great causes out there and you've chosen some great ones.
Thanks. So have you. You have a blessed day.
You too. Have you been on murk long?
Since last Thanksgiving. It's a small way to add a bit of extra money to the pot for travel. And you?
About a year now. I use it to pay for house upgrades...
Sounds like you're earning more than me....
